The company focuses on crafting engaging designs while leveraging in-depth UX research and AI design to streamline processes. Idhyha's approach includes ready-made kits to accelerate project ideation without compromising on quality. The mission is to deliver lightning-fast turnarounds and maximise return on invested capital through efficient design solutions. Clients can start with a complimentary consultation and benefit from tailored UI variations to meet their specific needs.
name: Idhyha Creatives & Technology

description: Rajdhani Enterprises Jaipur provides digital marketing solutions in the advertising sector.
long_description: Founded in 2022, Rajdhani Enterprises Jaipur operates in the advertising sector offering innovative digital marketing solutions. The company specializes in crafting impactful digital campaigns that include Digital Video Walkers, Digital Standees, and Digital Mobile Standing displays. With a focus on elevating brands, Rajdhani Enterprises employs personalized strategies tailored to client needs. Its mission is to redefine advertising through cutting-edge technology and creative approaches.
name: Rajdhani Enterprises Jaipur

description: Paravision Lab offers Edtech solutions for educational resources in artificial intelligence and parallel computing.
long_description: Founded in 2023, Paravision Lab operates in the Edtech sector offering a comprehensive suite of educational resources, including tutorials, blogs, and course materials. The company focuses on providing simplified and accessible education in artificial intelligence and parallel computing. Paravision Labs mission is to demystify these complex fields, ensuring a seamless and enriching learning experience for all individuals.
name: Paravision Lab

description: Digineoteric provides enterprise services through digital marketing solutions, including SEO, PPC, and web development.
long_description: Founded in 2017, Digineoteric operates in the Enterprise Services sector, offering digital marketing solutions such as SEO, PPC, SMO, Web Development, and Lead Generation to drive business growth. The company focuses on helping businesses thrive in the digital landscape by combining creativity, innovation, and data-driven strategies. Digineoteric is dedicated to creating tailored strategies that align with unique business goals, using industry expertise and cutting-edge tools to deliver measurable results.
name: Digineoteric

description: Codescarts offers rental-based mobile apps for businesses in the enterprise tech sector.
long_description: Founded in 2022, Codescarts operates in Enterprise Tech offering readymade mobile apps for rent at a monthly fee of 3999. The company simplifies app usage by providing affordable, rental-based access to mobile applications, catering to businesses seeking cost-effective tech solutions. This service model emphasises accessibility and efficiency in the tech market.
name: Codescarts

description: Digital Gyata offers digital marketing and website development services in the enterprise services sector.
long_description: Founded in 2023, Digital Gyata operates in the enterprise services sector offering digital marketing and website development services. Based in Delhi, the company provides a comprehensive range of services including website development, SEO, social media marketing, Google Ads, and more, aimed at transforming businesses into recognised brands. Digital Gyata is equipped with a team of skilled professionals who focus on creating effective marketing strategies to help businesses establish a strong online presence.
name: Digital Gyata

description: ByteAI offers Enterprise Tech solutions for unified management of AI infrastructure and resources.
long_description: Founded in 2025, ByteAI operates in Enterprise Tech offering a unified control plane for managing AI infrastructure. The company develops systems that centralise and streamline control over complex AI environments, to simplify the orchestration and oversight of AI resources across various deployments. It focuses on delivering operational efficiency through integrated control mechanisms.
name: ByteAI

description: ezmotion provides an AI-powered sales enablement platform for B2B sales teams.
long_description: Founded in 2025, ezmotion operates in Enterprise Tech offering an AI-powered sales enablement platform that transforms every customer conversation into insights to boost conversion and rep performance. The platform aids B2B sales teams by delivering real-time feedback, automating lead qualification, and enhancing rep coaching through AI roleplay training. It integrates seamlessly with CRMs like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Zoho, providing live funnel analytics and multilingual post-sale engagement to help teams scale smarter and enhance deal closure.
name: ezmotion

description: Arrow Gifter is an ecommerce company providing corporate gifting solutions through a B2B platform.
long_description: Founded in 2024, Arrow Gifter operates in ecommerce offering corporate gifting solutions through its B2B Gifts Shop, specialising in designer, high-quality gifts tailored for clients, partners, and teams. The company provides a luxury collection of premium gift sets and unique items, ensuring each product meets high standards. Arrow Gifter focuses on creating meaningful and memorable gifting experiences for various business needs.
name: Arrow Gifter

description: Placify is an edtech platform connecting students, universities, and enterprises for campus placements.
long_description: Founded in 2022, Placify operates in Consumer Services offering an intelligent and automated campus placement platform that connects students, universities, and enterprises. The platform streamlines the placement process by facilitating communication and opportunities among these key stakeholders. It serves to enhance the career prospects of students by providing more direct access to potential employers. Placify aims to improve the overall efficiency of campus placements through innovation and technology.
name: Placify

description: eMPS Automotive Software provides automotive embedded and safety-critical software services for vehicle technologies.
long_description: Founded in 2022, eMPS Automotive Software operates in Advanced Hardware & Technology offering automotive embedded and safety critical software services. The company focuses on developing embedded software for vehicles, supporting emerging and mature automotive technologies. eMPS aims to address the increasing complexity of automotive software, leveraging the extensive experience of its founders and the automotive expertise available in India to support industry transformation.
name: eMPS Automotive Software

description: The Last Analyst provides AI tools for D2C founders to optimize advertising efforts.
long_description: Founded in 2025, The Last Analyst operates in the AI sector offering tools that assist D2C founders in optimising their advertising efforts. The company focuses on leveraging artificial intelligence to enhance the performance and efficiency of digital ad campaigns. By providing tailored solutions, The Last Analyst seeks to empower businesses in the direct-to-consumer market to maximize their ad spend returns.
name: The Last Analyst

description: PixellPay provides fintech solutions for rural India, enhancing access to banking and financial services.
long_description: Founded in 2023, PixellPay operates in the Fintech sector offering technology services that bridge the gap between traditional financial institutions and Non-Banking Financial Institutions in rural India. The company provides modern banking solutions such as mobile banking, fund transfer services, and debit card facilities, empowering NBFIs to better serve rural customers. By facilitating access to microloans, savings accounts, and specialized financial products, PixellPay addresses the challenges presented by limited access to traditional banking in underserved areas. Its innovative solutions drive financial inclusion, significantly contributing to the economic development of rural communities across the country.
name: PixellPay

description: Escape Plan is an ecommerce platform offering premium travel luggage and accessories.
long_description: Founded in 2025, Escape Plan operates in Ecommerce offering a next-generation travel platform that redefines how the world shops for luggage and accessories. The company is building a vertical ecosystem for modern explorers, curating premium, design-led travel gear that combines utility and personality. Its product range includes hardcase luggage, backpacks, duffels, and a variety of accessories, all aimed at enhancing the travel experience. Escape Plan focuses on designing with intention and telling resonant stories for a generation of travellers. The company is positioned as a movement and platform for developing bold brands in the travel sector.
name: Escape Plan
